examples.korean: During the test, students are required to take notes based on a recorded lecture for the listening section, which allows students to demonstrate their understanding of concepts rather than simply identify vocabulary. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 시험(을 치르는)동안 학생들은 청취부분에 녹음된 강의 를 기초로 필기를 하도록 요구되며 이는 학생들이 단순히 어 휘를 확인하는 것보다 그들의 개념 이해를 보여주도록 한다. Neungyule
examples.english: During the test, students are required to take notes based on a recorded lecture for the listening section, which allows students to demonstrate their understanding of concepts rather than simply identify vocabulary. Add to Wordbook
